title: Enterprise Web Application
description: Full-stack enterprise application built with .NET Core and Angular
longDescription: A comprehensive enterprise web application featuring user management, reporting, and business process automation. Built with clean architecture principles and modern development practices.

title: Task Management Web App
description: Full-stack task management application with real-time updates
longDescription: A modern task management application built with React frontend and .NET backend. Features real-time collaboration using SignalR, drag-and-drop task organization, team management, and comprehensive reporting dashboard.

title: Inventory Management System
description: Desktop application for warehouse inventory management
longDescription: A robust desktop application built with WPF for managing warehouse inventory. Features barcode scanning, automated reorder alerts, comprehensive reporting, and integration with external suppliers' APIs.

title: Microservices Platform
description: Distributed microservices architecture with .NET and Docker
longDescription: A scalable microservices platform demonstrating modern distributed architecture patterns. Includes API Gateway, service discovery, distributed logging, monitoring, and automated deployment pipelines.

title: Mobile Expense Tracker
description: Cross-platform mobile app for expense tracking
longDescription: A cross-platform mobile application built with .NET MAUI for tracking personal and business expenses. Features OCR receipt scanning, category management, budget alerts, and cloud synchronization.
